text: Events in the year 2021 in the Russian Federation. ==Incumbents== *President: Vladimir Putin ==Events== === Scheduled Events === *June 3 — June 6 — XXIV St. Petersburg International Economic Forum *June 12—July 12 — Euro 2020.Евро-2020 может пройти в 13 городах по всей Европе. Gazprom Arena will host some of the games *October 1—October 31 — All-Russian population census of the Russian Federation. ===No date announces=== * It is planned to complete the construction Murmansk Commercial Sea PortAbout the construction of the Murmansk port. * It is planned to start mass production of the Russian medium- haul passenger airliner MC-21.The start of mass production of the MC-21 airliner was shifted to 2021 * Commissioning of the 2nd power unit at Leningrad Nuclear Power Plant-2 with a reactor VVER-1200.91731e804938bf0f8563f501a0508840 Market Council agreed to postpone the industrial commissioning of a number of nuclear units for a year or two ==See also== ==References== Category:2020s in Russia Category:Years of the 21st century in Russia Russia Russia Russia
title: 2021 in Russia
